about_the_game:
The action of "Against Death: dead-end road" takes place in the harsh world, where the apocalypse starts due to an unknown virus.
The main character John Carter is a former military man, and now a simple biker who is in search of himself.
And this day was supposed to be the same as many days before, but fate has prepared a different route…
When chaos begins in the city due to a virus that turns people into monsters, John finds himself in the thick of things. He will have to remember all his skills that he acquired in the army in order to survive and save his wife who disappeared in this mess, who plays an important role in this story.
In addition to monsters and looters, mercenaries also appear on the streets, but what are they doing here and why are they killing everyone indiscriminately?
Who is behind all this and what will happen next? It's up to you to find out!

Key Features:
many types of enemies (both alive and not alive)
big open world
extensive arsenal
smart enemies
different difficulty levels
beautiful and modern graphics
and much more…

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Against Death

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: fx 4170 or Core i3-4170
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10, 11
  • Processor: FX 8350 or i5 5400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: Action adventure thriller "Against Death: dead-end road " takes place in the harsh world of the beginning of the apocalypse due to an unknown virus. The John Carter is a former military man, and now a simple biker who is in search of himself.And this day was supposed to be the same...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Turkish
